precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Put the post it in front of you with your left hand.
Start with your arm in a neutral position on the table.
Slide your arm forward as far as you can to reach for the pink post-it.
Slide your arm back as far as you can towards your body.
Repeat the process of straightening your elbow and reaching forward for the pink post-it.
Bring your arm back to your body again.
Repeat these steps once more. Let me guide you through the steps.
